title: Fan Fic contest
body: I'm pretty sure there are trolls just going through and downvoting all the stories with upvotes, lots of perfectly good stories just got numerous downvotes suddenly for no reason, and it happens in waves every 2 days. Thats not a coincidence by any means.

replies.body: Trolls everywhere, ruin someones game, story, day then go have a giggle wank over messing up someones good time. Oce is full of spiteful children it seems, they must think that fun is a finite commodity. Oh s/he is having fun there must be less to go around now, I'll steal their fun. That makes it my fun now. They are thieves. stealing the things that make this community good.

If someone has put in effort to write a story, there is no reason for down-voting it.

Some people are just sad inside...

Thanks for bringing this up.

We have purposefully made it so the Fan Fic sub board is ONLY sorted by NEW. This means that votes don't affect anything there.

Also the competition will be graded based of writing criteria and not board votes. So the trolls are really just wasting their time.
Well that's good, glad people wont suffer because of that.
